details.title: A Prescription for Sub-Millimeter-Wave Transistor Characterization
details.abstract: In this paper, we present an approach for characterizing transistors embedded in microstrip lines formed on a thin bisbenzocyclobutene-based (BCB) monomers film at sub-millimeter-wave wavelengths. We demonstrate the approach at frequencies up to 750 GHz and estimate the uncertainty of the procedure.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
